overview: Among the city of metal boxes any product or service can be found. The biggest market in Central Asia, Dordoi bazaar, is a workplace for over 150 thousands people. They trade, eat, pray and live there. The film portrays the place as the main character through fragments of its inhabitants. It allows viewers who are unfamiliar with the bazaar atmosphere to experience one. At the same time the bazaar serves as a metaphor for a broader kyrgyz society.
title: Dordoi city
